Chapter.Label: The Small Algebra Package
Chapter.Heading: Small MaltsevOperator Package
Chapter.Section:
Accessing Small MaltsevOperator AllSmallMaltsevOperator is an accessor function for accessing the complete list of non-isomorphic maltsevoperator models from orders 2 to 3.
The models are generated by Mace4 , using the definitions in Section .

Definition of MaltsevOperator formulas(MaltsevOperator).
a(x,x,y) = y & y = a(y,x,x).
end_of_list.
Dependency This package has no dependencies .
